title: pepetrading
author: pepetrading
content: BTC Hi, I would like to borrow at least $1000.I don't have any kind of reputation in this forum but I can show you my trading skills without any problem, I need this money to trade futures.I have been trading for some time with demo account and I see myself more than ready to jump to trading with real money, I can return 100% of the money lent with an additional 30% interest at the end of the month, if you are willing to lend me the money talk to my Telegram and for you to see my skills I will create a new demo account to show that I can return the money quickly. BTC@originaltrecedoce on Telegram

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Short answer for you is no you will never ever get 1$ from anyone, You need a valid collateral that worth more than 1000$ in order to get the loan otherwise you won’t even get a penny, Plus just to prove that you’re just another scammer is that no trader can make 100% in a month since you are saying you will pay back with interest. You’re full of lies that’s not trading it called crazy gambling. Go find a real job

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: pepetrading on November 21, 2022, 09:20:25 PMBTC Hi, I would like to borrow at least $1000.I don't have any kind of reputation in this forum but I can show you my trading skills without any problem, I need this money to trade futures.Why are you looking for a stranger over the internet to give you a loan then, if you have excellent trading skills as you claim?Don't you have relatives or friends? Borrow money from your relatives, multiply it using your trading skills and pay them back. Isn't that easier. I am sure they won't ask you for any collateral or interest?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: pepetrading on November 21, 2022, 09:20:25 PMI have been trading for some time with demo account and I see myself more than ready to jump to trading with real money, I can return 100% of the money lent with an additional 30% interest at the end of the monthI remember my impressions of trading and working with demo accounts. I must say that there is a huge difference between demo and real, and the fact that you may be good now does not mean that you will be good with real money.Trading can be considered gambling, so you should approach it with the famous one, the stake is only how much you are ready to lose. taking other people's money in order to gamble/trade does not fit in there. maybe you are delighted that you have mastered some trading basics, but your satisfaction with that is not good enough collateral to get this loan
